data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Anuppur to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Anuppur, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 26,400 people living in Anuppur.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 91 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Anuppur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Anuppur.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Pando people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Anuppur, Madhya Pradesh, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Anuppur, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.section_summary:
the county of Anuppur, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 26,400.

We estimate Anuppur has 290 people who might know Jesus, 320 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,789 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 91 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Anuppur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
